com.forte.qqrobot.utils

类 StringListReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • com.forte.qqrobot.utils.StringListReader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class StringListReader
extends java.io.Reader
    将字符串集合转化为Reader对象 未经测试可能存在BUG
    从以下版本开始:
    JDK1.8
    作者:
    ForteScarlet <[163邮箱地址]ForteScarlet@163.com>

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.io.Reader

        lock

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StringListReader(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
      Creates a new character-stream reader whose critical sections will synchronize on the reader itself.

    • 方法详细资料

      • read

        public int read(char[] cbuf,
                int off,
                int len)
        Reads characters into a portion of an array. This method will block until some input is available, an I/O error occurs, or the end of the stream is reached.
        指定者:
        read 在类中 java.io.Reader
        参数:
        cbuf - Destination buffer
        off - Offset at which to start storing characters
        len - Maximum number of characters to read
        返回:
        The number of characters read, or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs

      • close

        public void close()
        此流close的时候并不会关闭而是将索引值恢复到0的位置，毕竟本质只是个list集合所以无伤大雅（大概
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.io.Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在类中 java.io.Reader
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
